title: Start
body:
Congratulation, You have been selected to become a true immortal.
You will be given a job in buy and selling time at the government sanctioned pawn shop.
As part of the agreement, you will lose your current time of ["0" days, "0" hours, "0" Minute, "10" Seconds.]
Your timer will restart, and you will be given a total of ["0" days, "0" hours, "30" Minute, "0" Seconds,] and [6000] Credits for use in buying and selling time.
But that does not means your time will actual stop, As it will still be counting down to the end of your immortal life.
No matter disobeying the order, not reporting to work or using all of your remaining time will result in a complete erasure of your life.
You will be given a choice to buy your immortal at the end of the work week.
If you understand this report to work by next week, As of today your timer will be temporarily halted to give you time to get your affairs in order.
good luck.
